H0.text: Which explorer was cast adrift by his crew in 1611 and never seen again. John Cabot

H1.text: Which explorer was cast adrift by his crew in 1611 and never seen again. Vasco Nunez de Balboa

H2.text: Which explorer was cast adrift by his crew in 1611 and never seen again. Ferdinand Magellan

H3.text: Which explorer was cast adrift by his crew in 1611 and never seen again. Henry Hudson

A4.text: The mutineers cast Hudson, his son, and six others adrift.
